applicant-name.name: JIANGXI RUIQIAN AUTOMOBILE PARTS CO LTD
江西瑞黔汽车配件有限公司

invention-title: Filter shell of hydrogen energy automobile
一种氢能源汽车过滤器壳体

abstract.p: The invention discloses a hydrogen energy automobile filter shell, and relates to the technical field of automobile filters, the hydrogen energy automobile filter shell comprises a rapid assembly mechanism and a filter element body mounted in the rapid assembly mechanism, a shell mechanism is arranged on the outer side of the rapid assembly mechanism, and a plurality of connecting rotating shafts are arranged in the shell mechanism; the rapid splicing mechanism comprises a first splicing ring and a second splicing ring, positioning insertion holes are formed in the peripheries of the interiors of the first splicing ring and the second splicing ring, threaded sliding grooves are symmetrically formed in the inner walls of the positioning insertion holes, and fixing holes are formed in the ends, close to the threaded sliding grooves, of the second splicing ring. By arranging the quick assembling mechanism, quick positioning and splicing of the first splicing ring and the second splicing ring can be achieved by means of the characteristic that a connecting sleeve is in sliding connection with a positioning inserting hole, and by means of the characteristic that a threaded sliding groove in the positioning inserting hole is in sliding connection with a fixing protrusion, the quick splicing of the first splicing ring and the second splicing ring is achieved. And primary limiting of the connecting sleeve, the first splicing ring and the second splicing ring can be achieved.

本发明公开了一种氢能源汽车过滤器壳体，涉及汽车过滤器技术领域，包括快速拼装机构，以及安装于快速拼装机构内部的滤芯本体，所述快速拼装机构的外侧设置有壳体机构，且壳体机构的内部设置有若干连接转轴，所述快速拼装机构包括第一拼接环和第二拼接环，所述第一拼接环和第二拼接环的内部四周均开设有定位插孔，其中，定位插孔的内壁对称开设有螺纹滑槽，所述第二拼接环靠近螺纹滑槽的端部开设有固定孔，通过设置快速拼装机构不仅能够利用连接套筒与定位插孔滑动连接的特点，实现第一拼接环与第二拼接环的快速定位拼接，利用定位插孔内部的螺纹滑槽与固定凸起滑动连接的特点，能够实现连接套筒与第一拼接环和第二拼接环的初步限位。
